parameters.name: moderation
parameters.description: The meet can be of 3 types, open, moderate, closed.

parameters.description: The access to the meet can be general(accessible by everyone) or restricted(accessible only in groups to which it belongs).

parameters.description: In format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM. If specified, don't specified `duration`.

parameters.description: The duration of the meet in seconds. If specified, don't specified `end_datetime`.

parameters.description: The status of the meet (disabled, published, draft or suspended).

place.description: The group (place) where the meet take place.

location.description: if no place is specified, address of the meet.

moderation.description: Open(everyone can participate), moderate(participation is subject of moderation), closed(only ones having the url cat register)

access.description: general(accessible everywhere) or restricted(accessible only in a given group)

datetime.description: Date and time (with timezone) of the meet, must be coherent with the time_zone of the placeâ€™s location (or if place is not specified with the time_zone of the location)

end_datetime.description: Date and time (with timezone) of the meet, must be coherent with the time_zone of the placeâ€™s location (or if place is not specified with the time_zone of the location).

duration.description: Duration in seconds of the meet

photos.description: Array of photos. The first item is the cover photo

id.description: The unique identifier of the group.

place.description: true if is a place or false if not.

moderation.description: The group can be of 3 types: open, moderate, closed

access.description: The group's access can be open to everybody(general) or restricted.

options.description: is a json hash of several data/fields:

meets_count.description: The number of meets organized in this group.

members_count.description: The number of active members in this group.

id.description: The unique identifier of the resource.

title.description: optional, the name of the resource in question if relevant

legend.description: optional, the legend of this resource.

nature.description: optional, the category of this resource, by default general

id.description: The unique identifier of the location.

name.description: Optional, the name of the location in question if relevant

influence_area.description: True, if it is an influence area.

area.description: The range of the influence area of the location (in km).

zip_code.description: The zip code of this location.

address.description: The final address of this location.

timezone.description: The time zone of this location.

Location.description: List all locations of next meets

id.description: The unique identifier of the tag.

name.description: the tag in question with the hashtag, ex. #social

followers.description: total count of users who are following this tag.

groups.description: Array of parent groups of the meet

pending_groups.description: Array of parent pending groups of the meet

place.description: The group (place) where the meet take place

location.description: If no place is specified, address of the meet

moderation.description: Open(everyone can participate), moderate(participation is subject of moderation), closed(only ones having the url cat register)

access.description: general(accessible everywhere) or restricted(accessible only in a given group)

datetime.description: Date and time (with timezone) of the meet, must be coherent with the time_zone of the placeâ€™s location (or if place is not specified with the time_zone of the location)

end_datetime.description: Date and time (with timezone) of the meet, must be coherent with the time_zone of the placeâ€™s location (or if place is not specified with the time_zone of the location).

duration.description: Duration in seconds of the meet

photos.description: Array of photos. The first item is the cover photo
